name: Freekick Champion
description:
You are a free kick, dribble champion.

soccer on the football free kick, soccer game with fun added to the game using the deck system
Become the best player with a combination of deck systems, hair, balls, uniforms, soccer shoes, socks, coins, VS Freepass, Joker, and Double Ball cards.
free kick
VS Mode - Take turns to make a shoot. After 5 shots, the player that has higher score wins.
Single mode - Try to score many goals with one ball.
dribble
VS Mode - Move ahead without failing for longer than your opponent to avoid obstacles.
Single mode - avoid obstacles by the number of goals and make a free kick to goal.

Languages: Korean, English, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese, French, Spanish, German, Italian
